description: A symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders of the World, located in Agra, Uttar Pradesh.
Famous for its stunning forts, palaces, and vibrant culture, Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
Known for its golden beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage, Goa is a top tourist destination.
A breathtaking destination with lush valleys, serene lakes, and snow-capped mountains in Jammu and Kashmir.
A tranquil network of canals and lagoons, perfect for houseboat cruises and Ayurvedic retreats in Kerala.
Explore the unique living root bridges, lush green landscapes, and waterfalls of Meghalaya.
